name: io-gui
description: Io-Gui, a UI framework for web development.

scripts.build: pnpm clean && pnpm lint && tsc --project ./tsconfig.json && rollup -c && dts-bundle-generator --export-referenced-types false -o bundle/io-gui.d.ts build/io-gui.d.ts && rm -rf build && mv bundle build
scripts.build:icons: tsc --project ./packages/io-icons/tsconfig.json && rollup -c ./packages/io-icons/rollup.config.js && dts-bundle-generator --export-referenced-types false -o packages/io-icons/bundle/io-icons.d.ts ./packages/io-icons/build/io-icons.d.ts && rm -rf ./packages/io-icons/build && mv ./packages/io-icons/bundle ./packages/io-icons/build
scripts.build:markdown: tsc --project ./packages/io-markdown/tsconfig.json && rollup -c ./packages/io-markdown/rollup.config.js && dts-bundle-generator --export-referenced-types false -o packages/io-markdown/bundle/io-markdown.d.ts ./packages/io-markdown/build/io-markdown.d.ts && rm -rf ./packages/io-markdown/build && mv ./packages/io-markdown/bundle ./packages/io-markdown/build

author: Aleksandar (Aki) Rodic
